lead_paragraph: The perfectionist in Pep Guardiola forbids him to get remotely carried away by Manchester City's 100 percent record this season even though they made it 10 wins out of 10 under their new Spanish manager on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: 10 Out of 10 for Pep but the Perfectionist Demands More
headline.main: 10 Out of 10 for Pep but the Perfectionist Demands More

snippet: The perfectionist in Pep Guardiola forbids him to get remotely carried away by Manchester City's 100 percent record this season even though they made it 10 wins out of 10 under their new Spanish manager on Saturday....
